name: Trench Run (itch) (Heavens)
description:
Run the trench and take out the target!

  • You only have one shot, and you can only use this at the end of the trench
  • Missile colour now designates their explosion altitude red is low, green is medium, and blue is high
  • Map should always be generated in a way that can be completed - but still being tweaked
  • [Space] skips the scrolling text
  • Enjoy!

All 20 Second Game Jam entries Made with AGK found HERE.
